required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) Sizing and Leakage After Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation (TAVI) Before and After Establishing Routine Preprocedure Multi Slice Computerized Tomography (MSCT) Aortic Assessment. A Retrospective Registry Study
clinical_study.official_title: Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) Sizing and Leakage After Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation (TAVI) Before and After Establishing Routine Preprocedure Multi Slice Computerized Tomography (MSCT) Aortic Assessment. A Retrospective Registry Study

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of annular sizing strategy (MDCT versus TEE) in transcatheter aortic valve implantation on the prevalence and severity of paravalvular regurgitation.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of no/ mild paravalvular leakage before and after introduction of routing preoperative MSCT
MSCT vs. echocardiographic aortic valve sizing before TAVI
THV size before and after introduction of routing preoperative MSCT

study_pop.textblock: Primary analysis will be done in patients with a successful THV implantation and availability of high quality echocardiographic assessment and in the post routing MSCT group on the availability of a high quality MSCT scan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients implanted with a THV at Aarhus University Hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Learning curve patients (the first 40 patients implanted with a THV device at Aarhus University Hospital, Skejby).

facility.name: Department of Cardiology and Cardiothoracic Surgery, Aarhus University Hospital
